price: Ella dijo: "Me refugio en el Compasivo de ti, [apártate de aquí] si es que tienes temor de Dios".
arabic: قَالَتۡ إِنِّيٓ أَعُوذُ بِٱلرَّحۡمَٰنِ مِنكَ إِن كُنتَ تَقِيّٗا

version.title: Spanish Translation - Isa Garcia
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish by Muhammad Isa Garcia - Printed in 1433 H.

meta.transliteration: qālat innī aʿūdhu bil-raḥmāni minka in kunta taqiyyan
